segments.text: I can hear the faint trickle of the water overflowing, a relentless sound in the background.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It strikes me as odd that the woman has not noticed a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focused expression makes me both amused and worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are clearly up to something, and sheâ€™s totally missing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's face is lit up with delight as he reaches for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a twinge of jealousy for his carefree attitude.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, deep down, I know this could end badly with one wrong move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish the woman would look down and see her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems like a haven in comparison to this risky kitchen drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a strange mix of emotions as I watch this scene unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR
